desc: Founded in 2014, The Smithery is an independent, woman-owned jewelry studio in Columbus, Ohio. Featuring bespoke jewelry designed and hand crafted from recycled precious metals. The Smithery offers a private Make Your Own Wedding Band Workshop where couples can make commitment rings together.

layout.text:
The Smithery Jewelry is a true collaboration between two artists, from designing to handcrafting the details of each piece.

Inspired by the world around us, we create one of a kind and limited edition jewelry featuring unique gemstones, rich textures, and recycled precious metals.
